Text: Hi! do you know anything about the White Stripes Outtakes? The new vault pack is ready and those songs still aren't on internet
First of all, a big thanx for all the uploads. I open the Dead Weather mp4 with Windows Media Player and there's no audio in that. Do you know why?

@teo3rid 

Yes, Windows Media Player does not fully support the MP4 format.

Simple Solution.  Download VLC media player from videolan.org

It free and THE best media player on the market... if VLC don't play your files nothing will.
